geoQuery.query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT d.ILI_DATA_ID ID, d.ILI_INSPECTION_ID, c.X_COORD X, c.Y_COORD Y, d.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION "label", d.ANOMALY_TYPE_CL||CASE WHEN d.ref_event_id is not null THEN '_LNK' ELSE '_NOTLNK' end "type" FROM PODS.ILI_DATA d JOIN PODS.COORDINATE c ON c.COORDINATE_ID = d.COORDINATE_ID JOIN PODS.ILI_ANOMALY_TYPE_CL ia on d.anomaly_type_cl=ia.code AND ia.code in (1004,1003) WHERE c.LOCATION_ID != -1 ) d WHERE ILI_INSPECTION_ID IN ({ILI_INSP_FILTER}) AND {FILTER} ORDER BY Y desc, X
